name: Extraterrestrial Discharge (Demo)
description:
We've all heard the stories of humans claiming to have been abducted and waking up with no explanation how they got there. As the flying saucer you get to tell these riveting physics defying stories.

How to Play:

• Tap to drop the abductees

....and that's it! 

Drop off your abductees across 6 different, increasingly outlandish levels!

Try to get all 3 of them in the right spots in each level. Don't worry too much about human suspicion or injuring the subjects, they'll probably be fine.

Please take our very short survey after playing HERE; we really want your feedback!

This is a WIP (work in progress) of Rabble Games Studio's first video game as a studio. We want to get feedback from everyone as we progress in development to make the best game we can.

If you want to follow us as we share more we have a Facebook, Instagram & Twitter page.
